about_the_game:
Special Ops: Operation Assault is an action-packed FPS game where you battle global terrorists. Play as a commando soldier, complete all missions in different locations, and use every powerful weapon to do that. Defuse bombs, rescue hostages, and thwart enemy plans!

Close quarters, high impact! In the heat of the battle, you'll need every ounce of your skill and courage to emerge victorious. Get ready for a heart-pounding, adrenaline-fueled showdown where every step counts.


Frag out! Time to unleash chaos! When the smoke clears and the dust settles, only the boldest warriors will remain. Grab your gear, rally your squad, and get ready for an all-out war where survival means mastering the art of controlled mayhem.


One shot. One kill. Become the ultimate sniper. In the world of precision marksmanship, you'll need nerves of steel and an unwavering eye. Take on the role of an elite sniper and prove that a single, well-placed shot can change the course of battle forever.


Shredding targets, one shell at a time! Step into the heart of the action as you wield the devastating power of your shotgun. With each pull of the trigger, you'll tear through your foes, leaving nothing but chaos in your wake. The battlefield is your canvas, and your shotgun is the brush – paint it red, one shell at a time.


Features:

- over 20 unique missions
- 4 locations including cargo ship, smuggling tunnels, terrorist campsite and storage units
- 11 upgradable weapons with old-time classics like AK47 and MP5
- 6 secret missions
- Challenging time based objectives
- Immersive audio and sound effects

Neutralize terrorists in different regions, defusing bombs, rescuing hostages, and more. The clock is ticking, so act fast to earn highest reward!

As a commando, you'll face enemies head-on. Upgrade your arsenal, clear the desert of terrorists, and prove your skills. Engage in intense battles, use stealth or heavy firepower, and be the hero in Special Ops: Operation Assault!

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes scenes of violence against humans, with mild amount of blood
